description.en_US: The standard Triblader ranged attacks.
The standard Hexacast ranged attacks.
The \c[3]homing\c[0] Hexacast charged shots.
The standard Triblader melee attacks.
Triblader4's faster, weaker melee attacks.
The standard Hexacast melee attacks.
Uses the Triblader dashing animation.
Triblader5's steerable dash.
Uses the Triblader guarding animation.
Throw a heavy spike ball that pierces enemies and bounces off walls.
Throw out a volley of shards that home in on an enemy. More accurate at long range.
A powerful shot that explodes on contact, doing collateral damage.
Throw three handfuls of powerful knives. More accurate at close range.
A powerful spinning strike that can hit multiple targets in an area.
Swing and scatter a field of blade fragments in front of you. More effective on larger targets.
Take a gamble and roll a number from 1 to 9 for different attack results.
A massive swing that sends all enemies in front of you flying.
Fling out bits of shrapnel from your sword that damage enemies.
A fast controllable dash able to hit multiple enemies.
A very powerful attack that will hit exactly one enemy.
description.de_DE: Ein sehr starker Angriff, der genau einen Gegner trifft.
description.zh_CN: 对单个敌人的强大攻击。
description.ja_JP: 敵単体のみにヒットする、とても強力な攻撃。
description.ko_KR: 정확히 하나의 적을 강하게 공격합니다.
description.zh_TW: 對單個敵人的強大攻擊。

description.en_US: A controllable dash through the shadows. Enemies on your path will be struck with a delayed strike.
Dash to a target, hit them into the sky, then jump up and do a falling spin attack.
Passively shoots out projectiles randomly in all directions.
Surrounds you with a spinning blade that damages enemies that get too close. Increase of \c[3]+30%\c[0] Defense while active.
Places temporary shields to block weak projectiles. Also increases your defense by \c[3]+50%\c[0] while active.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a laser barrage fired from orbit.
A barrage of fiery daggers that stick into their target and deal damage over time.
Throw a devastating spear forged from pure solar fragments. Sticks in enemies and deals damage over time.
Performs a fierce whirl attack, engulfing your enemies in flames.
description.de_DE: Ein heftiger Wirbelangriff, der deine Feinde in Flammen verschlingt.
description.zh_CN: 施展一次强大的旋转攻击，用火焰打击敌人。
description.zh_TW: 施展一次強大的旋轉攻擊，用火焰打擊敵人。
description.ja_JP: 前方に強力な回転攻撃をし、敵を炎の渦に包み込む。
description.ko_KR: 맹렬한 소용돌이 공격으로 적을 불에 휩쓸리게 합니다.

description.en_US: A blazing thrust of fire piercing through enemies in front of you.
description.de_DE: Ein Feuerstoß, der deine Feinde vor dir durchbohrt.
description.zh_CN: 使用一团猛烈的火焰攻击你前方的敌人，造成\c[3]燃烧\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 前方の敵を貫く、燃え盛る炎の攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 눈앞에 있는 적을 관통하며 불에 태우는 공격입니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 使用一團猛烈的火焰攻擊你前方的敵人，造成\c[3]燃燒\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Summon Landrunner that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.de_DE: Summon Landrunner that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.zh_CN: Summon Landrunner that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.ja_JP: Summon Landrunner that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.ko_KR: 적에게 다가가 자폭하는 랜드러너를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Attack with a powerful flail that does heavy damage to all enemies it hits. The tip does more damage than the chain.
Hit a single enemy and follow up with an arc of piercing beams.
Unleash a controllable spin attack that pulls enemies in.
description.ko_KR: 조종 가능한 스핀 공격을 일제히 가해 적을 끌어당깁니다.

description.en_US: Summon Landrunner squad that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.de_DE: Summon Landrunner squad that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.zh_CN: Summon Landrunner squad that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.ja_JP: Summon Landrunner squad that approaches an enemy and explodes.
description.ko_KR: 적에게 다가가 자폭하는 랜드러너 분대를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: A quick melee attack followed by a devastating, controllable spin attack that throws exploding knives everywhere.
A surgical strike against a single close enemy. If hit, follow up with powerful meteors and fireballs.
A dazzling flurry of fire finished with a devastating pillar of fire.
description.ko_KR: 폭발에 휘말린 적에게 현란한 난무 이후 파괴적인 불기둥으로 마무리합니다.

description.en_US: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.de_DE: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.zh_CN: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.ja_JP: Summon Landrunners that make a march and crush the enemy, and then explodes together.
description.ko_KR: 적에게 몸통박치기를 하면서 진격하고, 일제히 자폭하는 랜드러너 중대를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: A rapid spinning dash attack that hits all enemies along the way.
Churn up a lingering fire tornado before dashing away.
Ignite enemies with an intense spinning attack.
description.ko_KR: 강렬한 회전공격으로 적을 불사릅니다.

description.en_US: Dash forward along with a handful of mirages and perform firey slashes. Mirages will explode if they hit an enemy for greater damage.
A frantic, controllable dash the ends in a spin attack. Leaves a trail of flame pillars that block projectiles and damage enemies.
A daring leap attack to create a powerful circular fire barrier that traps enemies.
description.ko_KR: 저돌적인 도약 공격과 함께 강력한 원형 화염 장벽을 생성해 적을 가둬버립니다.

description.en_US: Hit an enemy into the air to be blasted by a powerful heatwave, also catching surrounding enemies in the blast.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a powerful sword strike.
Sacrifice \c[1]-25%\c[0] of your HP and increase your ATK by \c[2]+15%\c[0] for a moderate period. Can be stacked at your own risk.
Create a ring of swords around you, dealing damage to enemies who enter it.
description.ko_KR: 자신 주변에 검의 고리를 만들어 그 안에 들어오는 적에게 대미지를 입힙니다.

description.en_US: Perfect guard an attack and counter with flamethrower blasts from three angles.
Draw in enemies and then engulf them in lingering fires.
An apocalyptic cacophony of beams, fire, lasers, and explosions that hits everything in the area.
Summon a sword of holy flames that will supercharge your melee attacks, provide knockback resistance, and \c[3]10%\c[0] damage reduction for a short period.
Perfect guard an attack and finish off your enemies with a multitude of swords.
description.ko_KR: 공격을 완벽히 방어하고 수많은 검으로 적을 끝내버립니다.

description.en_US: Shoot a flurry of snowballs emitting from a stationary point.
Throw snowflakes that explode into multiple hailstones aimed at nearby enemies. The hail does more damage than direct hits with the snowflakes.
Throws an ice hook that strongly pulls in enemies.
description.ko_KR: 적을 강하게 끌어당기는 얼음 갈고리를 던집니다.

description.en_US: Shoot out a controllable stream of freezing wind from your sword.
Throws a powerful snowflake bomb that showers an area in icy hail before exploding on contact.
Throws an ice chain hook that pulls enemies along the chain.
description.ko_KR: 적을 가까이 끌어당기는 얼음 사슬 갈고리를 던집니다.

description.en_US: Swing your sword to shoot three powerful frost rays that pierce all enemies.
Summon an Ice Tank and blast your enemies away with explosive icicles.
description.ko_KR: 얼음 전차를 생성해 폭발성 고드름으로 적을 날려버립니다.

description.en_US: Pull enemies closer to you and finish them off with a powerful ice spear.
description.ko_KR: 맞은 적을 가까이 끌어당기고 강력한 얼음 창으로 마무리합니다.

description.en_US: Blast enemies with a spontaneous eruption of ice chunks before slashing them away.
Two wide icy sword slashes that can hit multiple enemies in front of you.
Punch enemies and trap them in a valley of icicles.
Pierce an enemy in front of you with an ice spear.
description.ko_KR: 얼음 창으로 눈앞의 적을 꿰뚫어버린다.

description.en_US: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.de_DE: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.zh_CN: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.ja_JP: Summon Snowflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.ko_KR: 적에게 돌진하는 눈송이를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Hit a single enemy with a short-range combo to knock them into a powerful icicle rupture.
Perform a large swirling area attack that spawns a ring of frozen stars.
Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.de_DE: Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.zh_CN: Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.ja_JP: Summon Freezeflake that rushing to the enemy.
description.ko_KR: 적에게 돌진하는 얼음송이를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Move forward while blasting enemies in front of you with freezing wind.
Draw in enemies before lunging forward, striking a single enemy with a powerful icicle rupture and avalanche.
Engulf enemies in a swirling hurricane before finishing with a powerful slash. Can also hit flying enemies.
Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.de_DE: Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.zh_CN: Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.ja_JP: Summon Cryogen armed with icicles and snowflakes.
description.ko_KR: 고드름 연발과 눈송이 소환 공격으로 무장한 크라이오젠을 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Lunge through enemies with an icy blade, leaving behind a trail of frozen stars.
Perform a fast dash that attacks one enemy and freezes them solid. Victim gains \c[3]+30%\c[0] DEF while frozen.
\i[class-tri] Slash enemies away and spawn several icicles in front of you, blocking projectiles and damaging enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: \i[class-tri] Stoße Gegner weg und verbarrikadiere dich hinter Eiskristallen, die Projektile blocken und Gegner bei Kontakt verwunden.
description.zh_CN: \i[class-tri] 在你的前方召唤出数根冰柱，阻挡敌人的射击。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: \i[class-tri] 近くにいる敵を吹き飛ばし、つららを前方に数個発生させる。つららは触れた敵にダメージを与え、飛び道具も防いでくれる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: \i[class-tri] 적을 날려버리고 자신의 앞에 다수의 고드름을 생성해 발사체를 막고 이에 닿는 적에 대미지를 가합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: \i[class-tri] 在你的前方召喚出數根冰柱，阻擋敵人的射擊。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: \i[class-tri] Instantly encase yourself in ice, negating huge amounts of damage for a short time. Heals \c[2]+5%\c[0] of HP throughout the duration but can be dash-canceled.
A barrage of icicles and hailstones are unleased in a flurry of slashes over a wide area.
Quickly encase yourself in ice for longer, negating even more damage and healing \c[2]+25%\c[0] of your maximum HP while frozen. Dash-cancelable.
Summon a field of powerful icicles to impale enemies in the area.
Construct a towering ice platform and freeze yourself to heal \c[2]+40%\c[0] of your HP and cure status effects.
Throw two very fast, accurate, and piercing lightning bolts.
Throw out magnetic prisms that will zap the enemy you proceed to mark with a projectile.
Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.de_DE: Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.zh_CN: Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ja_JP: Summon Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ko_KR: 주변의 적에게 번갯불을 발사하는 위스프를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Throw a projectile that chases an enemy before striking with a lightning bolt.
Throw three straight bolts that pierce enemies and deal lingering damage.
Throw a slow-moving electric prism that zaps nearby enemies as it travels.
Magnet Prism except shaped like a circle.
Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.de_DE: Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.zh_CN: Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ja_JP: Summon Hi Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ko_KR: 주변의 적에게 번갯불을 발사하는 하이 위스프를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: Throw a projectile that slowly seeks an enemy before moving in for a final strike.
Throw two large, rotating lightning storms that draw in enemies and deal heavy damage as they travel, striking all in their path.
Hit a single enemy to unleash a devastating attack involving advanced magnet prisms.
Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.de_DE: Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.zh_CN: Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ja_JP: Summon Ultra Wisp firing lightning at nearby enemies.
description.ko_KR: 주변의 적에게 번갯불을 발사하는 울트라 위스프를 소환합니다.

description.en_US: A wide swing with a special sword that releases a swarm of electric bees.
Strike an enemy with a quick thrust. If hit, three shadow sparks will surround and attack the enemy after some time.
Hit an enemy with a chainsaw and grind them down.
description.ko_KR: 전기톱으로 적을 띄운 후 갈아버립니다.

description.en_US: Summon two clones in a triangular formation to perform spinning attacks before you re-merge and perform a powerful finisher.
Hit an enemy to summon a lightning strike in front of you, dealing heavy damage to anything caught in the blast.
Hit a single enemy in front of you to unleash a combo attack before ending with a wide slash.
Hit a single enemy with a flurry of rapid strikes before sending them flying with a powerful slash.
Use an electricity barrier to charge through multiple enemies.
Hit a single enemy to perform a quick flurry of phantom strikes.
Dash along a jagged path, leaving behind a trail of lightning strikes.
Dash into a single enemy to mark them for a homing laser attack.
Dash forward and leave a devastating lightning storm along your path.
Experience time at a faster rate for a brief period. Slightly reduces ATK, FOC stats while active.
Block one attack and stop time for everything but yourself.
description.de_DE: Blocke einen Angriff und stoppe die Zeit für alle außer dich selbst.
description.zh_CN: 格挡一次攻击，并停止除自己之外的一切时间。
description.ja_JP: 攻撃を一度だけ防ぎ、自分以外の時間を止める。
description.ko_KR: 한 공격을 차단하고 자신을 제외한 시간을 멈춥니다.
description.zh_TW: 格擋一次攻擊，並停止除自己之外的一切時間。

description.en_US: Activate an aura that passively shoots lightning bolts at nearby enemies.
Throw an arc of powerful wave bombs.
Hit an enemy with a curse that absorbs HP over time.

name.ja_JP: \i[class-penta] フェアリーストリーム

description.en_US: Throw an inaccurate spread of piercing projectiles.
Throws a glaive that continuously drains the health of the enemy it hits.
description.ko_KR: 맞춘 적의 체력을 지속적으로 흡수하는 글레이브를 투척합니다.

description.en_US: Shoot a wide spread of bubbles that slow enemies on hit.
Throw a bouncing orb that follows enemies and explodes when it lands.
Throw a projectile that will create a lingering zone that absorbs HP from all enemies within.
Serve up an explosive orb and punch it down in the direction you're aiming.
Tracks enemies and throws a pile of glaives that continuously drain the health of enemies they hit.
description.ko_KR: 적을 추적하며 맞춘 적의 체력을 지속적으로 흡수하는 글레이브 무더기를 투척합니다.

description.en_US: Throw an orb that summons seeking bombs upon bouncing off walls.
Summon a line of decoys that shoot rapid-fire projectiles in a row, followed by powerful lasers.
Summon a powerful tornado that chases after enemies.
A quick and explosive spin attack that knocks enemies back.
Spin a deadly glaive in front of you.
description.ko_KR: 정면에서 치명적인 글레이브를 회전시킵니다.

description.en_US: Lunge forward and blast an enemy with a wave vortex, before swinging them away.
Draw in enemies before triggering a large explosion.
Place a mine that explodes when enemies move nearby.
The enemy hit by your dash dissolves into scattered wave energy, taking massive damage when it re-forms. Hits enemies with frontal shields.
Soul Shatter except with circle effects, and no sword animations.
Dash away and leave behind a decoy that will carry out a basic attack.
Dash into an enemy to target them for a relentless bombardment, during which they will be slowed.
Dash away and leave behind an army of decoys that will use more powerful attacks.
Summons three orbiting wave turrets that shoot nearby enemies.
Block frontal attacks and recover some of the blocked damage for a short time.
Quickly teleport into the air, then crash down with an explosion.
Empower your sword with a healing essence, causing all standard attacks to emit healing projectiles for a time.
Perfect guard an attack and infect your attacker, who violently explodes shortly after.
